G

game - package game
Provides classes necessary to run the game, as well as to modify the state of the game.
Game - Class in game
class, where the game itself is created and started.
Game(String, String, Level, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class game.Game
creates a multiplayer game of hungryball.
Game(String, Level, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class game.Game
creates a singleplayer game of hungryball.
GameOverScreen - Class in gui
GUI window, in which the player's final score is shown, as well as a list of high scores and the option to enter a name if the player has achieved a high enough score.
GameOverScreen(int, int) - Constructor for class gui.GameOverScreen
creates and displays the GameOverScreen.
GameSettingsMenu - Class in gui
GUI window, in which the user can choose options and set up a Game of Hungryball.
GameSettingsMenu(boolean) - Constructor for class gui.GameSettingsMenu
creates and displays the GameSettingsMenu.
getBlockSize() - Method in class gui.PaintPanel
returns the pixel size (width / height) of the individual tiles in the level.
getColor() - Method in class ingameObjects.Enemy
returns the color of the sprite of the enemy,can be "yellow", "cyan", "red, "pink".
getDirection() - Method in class ingameObjects.Character
returns the direction the Character is moving in: 0: static, 1: right, 2: up, -1: left, -2: down.
getEatableCounter() - Method in class level.Level
returns the number of eatable objects in the level (excluding enemies).
getEnemyList() - Method in class level.Level
returns a list that holds the enemies that are in the level.
getEnemyRespawnPosition() - Method in class level.Level
returns the coordinates of the level, where the enemies are respawned after they were eaten.
getEntryCount(int) - Static method in class scoreBoard.ScoreBoard
return the count of entries of the scoreboard matching the gameMode.
getHeight() - Method in class level.Level
returns the number of rows in the level.
getIconPath() - Static method in class gui.Config
returns the path to the icon for the GUI.
getIngameObjects() - Method in class level.Level
Returns a shallow copy of the internal matrix, in which the objects are placed.
getIngameObjectsOnPosition(int, int) - Method in class level.Level
 
getIsPressed() - Method in class game.MyKeyListener
Returns the value of the isPressed flag.
getLevel() - Method in class ingameObjects.HungryBall
returns the level in which the hungryball is placed.
getLives() - Method in class ingameObjects.HungryBall
returns the amount of times the hungryball is allowed to get hit by enemies.
getMenuButtonSoundPath() - Static method in class gui.Config
returns the path to the audio file, used for the sound effect for pressing a button in the menu.
getPlayer1() - Method in class game.Game
returns a deep-copy of the hungryBall object of the first player.

getPosition_y() - Method in interface ingameObjects.Eatable

getPosition_y() - Method in class ingameObjects.IngameObject
returns the y-coordinate of the object placed in the level.
getScore() - Method in class ingameObjects.HungryBall
returns the score / points which the player has earned until now.
getScreenSizeX() - Method in class gui.IngameGui
returns the horizontal screen size in pixels.
getScreenSizeY() - Method in class gui.IngameGui

getSprite() - Method in class ingameObjects.HungryBall
returns the absolute path to the currently active sprite as a String, depending on if the player is currently undefeatable or not.
getSprite() - Method in class ingameObjects.IngameObject
returns the path to the sprite of the object as a String.
getSpriteMirrored() - Method in class ingameObjects.IngameObject

getSpriteTransformation(IngameObject, int, int) - Method in class gui.PaintPanel

getUndefeatable() - Method in class ingameObjects.HungryBall
returns true if the player is currently able to eat enemies.
getUpdateTime() - Method in class game.Game
returns the time it takes (in ms) until the gamestate is updated again after an update.
getValue() - Method in interface ingameObjects.Eatable
